text: Godɨn Akɨnafarim kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Abraham, a nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Godɨn itima, God an ganigha a dɨbora ghaze, a nan damazimɨn derazir gumazim.” Egha God kamaghɨn a dɨbori, “Nan roroam.” Ezɨ akar kamɨn mɨngarim, God a gamizɨma me Akɨnafarimɨn an osiri, Abraham uan otarim Aisak gamizir dughiamɨn arazir kam, a bar azenan oto.
